extension.summary: Uitgebreide MOD van Confluence skin origineel door Jezz_X en CCM door Mudislander.
extension.description: Anon-Fluence is a mod of Xonfluence which is a MOD of Confluence to enable a greater degree of user customisation to the default skin (based by Mudislander's CCM).
Anon-Fluence is a mod of Xonfluence which is a MOD of Confluence to enable a greater degree of user customisation to the default skin (based by Mudislander's CCM).

extension.disclaimer: You break it - You get to keep the pieces
